name: Sunder
desc: Severs the life from both Terrorblade and a target hero, exchanging a percentage of both units' current health. Some health points must remain.

name: Cursed Crown
desc: Dark Willow casts an ancient fae curse on the target. After a delay, the target and nearby enemies are stunned.

name: Hand of God
desc: Heals all allied heroes on the map as well as all units under Chen's control.

name: Fortune's End
desc: CHANNELED - Gathers Oracle's power into a bolt of scouring energy that, when released, damages, roots, and purges enemies of buffs in an area around the target. If target is an ally it will only purge. Can be channeled for up to 2.5 seconds. The root duration is equal to the time spent channeling.\n\nDISPEL TYPE: Basic Dispel

name: Rip Tide
desc: The Naga Siren and her images hit all nearby units with a damaging wave of water that lowers armor for 8 seconds.

name: Impetus
desc: Places an enchantment on each attack while activated, causing it to deal additional damage based on how far away the target is.  The farther the target, the greater the damage dealt.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Disruption
desc: Banishes the targeted unit from the battlefield for a short duration.  Upon returning, two illusions of the banished unit are created under Shadow Demon's control.

name: Snowball
desc: Tusk begins rolling into a snowball. Allies within a 350 radius can also be added to the snowball by right-clicking on them, even while the snowball is moving. Once launched, any enemies caught in the snowball's path will be stunned and take damage. Each allied Hero in the snowball will add to its damage.

name: Echo Stomp
desc: Elder Titan and his Astral Spirit both stomp the ground, damaging and knocking nearby enemy units unconscious around their locations.  The Elder Titan stomp deals physical damage, while the Spirit stomp deals magical damage.

name: Open Wounds
desc: Lifestealer rends an enemy unit, slowing the victim's movement speed and allowing all allies to regain health for a percentage of the damage they deal to that unit. All damage dealt will steal life, including damage from spells. The victim recovers movement speed over the duration.
